reviews.review: It's more Portal. That's all you need too know!
its really good and has a co-op mode and it's cheap you can also get a mod that is good once you get the game!!!!! :)
still as good as when it came out, third game will come out eventually, right guys..? :)

Can't believe I'm only writing a review now.

Go play this amazing work of art. It's still one of the best things out there today!!!

I cannot tell you how many times I've played this game either on Steam or Xbox. The level designs and story are seriously well thought out, and I can say that Portal 2 has made my top 5 list of favorite all time games. I highly recommend this one for anyone itching for a critical thinking game that'll have you stumped on several occasions. 11/10

This is my first review on steam, i hope it's good enought for the first one. Portal 2 was my first game on steam a few years ago (i think it was 2017), and even thought i didn't even knew anything about Portal and Portal 2, it was very fun and interesting. I can't remember anymore how long it took me, but i can remember that i played throught the story pretty fast. I played the story already a few times by now and i've built a few test chambers (it's been a while since i built one thought) and currently i'm finally playing the coop mode (i didn't know there was an online mode until a few weeks ago) and it is also very good. I can only recommend playing it and you don't really need to play Portal to understand whats going on in Portal 2, but if you played Portal before Portal 2 the story also continues. Don't know how to describe it. It's really a good game and worth the money.
This game was very fun and I was able to beat the entire game in one day (5 hours)

One of the best games ever made

Es f√ºhlt sich nach einer Reise bei der man dabei ist und nicht nur eine Gameplay basierte Story wo es einen Weg gibt wie zum Beispiel in Games wie Life is Strange oder Life Strange 2. Und auch die Musik ist absolut Klasse. Und ich liebe es mich einfach hinzusetzen und Portale irgendwo hin zuschie√üen ohne zu verstehen was ich √ºberhaupt gerade tuhe.

i love how GLaDOS is still a salty **** after the events of the first game though she wasn't at first at the end of the first game one of the lines in the song "i'm not even angry i'm being so sincere right now" but 50000+ years of reliving your death would defiantly make you spiteful voice cast 10/10 graphics foe when it came out are still fantastic if there is a portal 3 i will most certainly enjoy it

ESSE JOGO √â OTIMO! VALE A PENA JOGAR.

i really would like to make a simple review for this, but I can't, Portal 2 is mor than just a game, is a life experience, I have no such words to describe Portal 2. I bought this game yesterday and finished today, I was about 3 hours AFK, so I played 6 hours of the game, I can certainly say that these were one of the best hours in my life. The graphics are smooth and precise, the Portal Gun gimmick is damn so satisfactory and fun to use, all of the systems in game are used perfectly used, I really can't say a bad point about this game, I just think he game is pretty short, and please, VALVE, DO A PORTAL 3. This game is such a masterpiece in all of video game history. (This was my attempt in real words to describe Portal 2)
A timeless classic for every gamer out there. Portal 2 should be the first game in any newbie's library.

great puzzles, love the story. Would recommend portal and portal 2 to anyone who likes puzzle games
The only real reason i got this is to play co-op with my fiance, and it was great!

As I haven't been a pc gamer for long (about a month). This is my first portal game, I really love this game. The story is probably one of the few stories I've played in a while. If you like puzzle games and just want a casual walk through of a game this is it.
